OSM Mapping Party

Register Here

We GLUG-PESCE in collaboration with FSMK ( Free Software Movement of Karnataka ) presents

The OSM Mapping Party.

Open Street Map is a free and open source software. 
In order to contribute to the Software Freedom day we are hosting  a Mapathon in MANDYA. So grab a seat now.
And let's contribute to the open map data and make a count.

Venue :
-CSE Seminar Hall
-PES COLLEGE OF ENGINEERING
-Mandya

Date :
-7th September, 2019

Time :
-9 AM to 4:30 PM

Contact :
-Mahima : +91 91641 96638
-Mukunda : +91 8050180183

Register Here !!!
